Notes

Flownotes are carefully crafted, each morning, by artisan link-chefs and shared using Workflowy - Organize your brain.

Catch us on twitter and Facebook and get notified when new episodes are posted.

Listen to other great shows on the Goodstuff Broadcasting Network!

This show is produced by Kenny Roderick and Kyle Roderick. It originally aired Friday, March 18, 2016 at 7AM Pacific.
